channel.title: coding on babble
channel.description: Recent content in coding on babble

item.title: 037 - Maybe I Should Just Get Started
item.description: I have this idea that I’ll eventually start some big project that will be really technically interesting and challenging, and I’ll work on it for years and it will pay my bills and maybe even make me rich. I’m currently not doing that, like not doing any work on that, because I feel like I have to do something else first. I feel like I have to do some sort of stepping stone project.

item.title: 012 - Changing Yourself If It Makes Sense
item.description: When I was a kid I don’t think I had much sense of identity. I just kind of went to school and played tennis (so I guess I’m talking from like 5 years old to maybe 11 or 12), hung out with friends, read books. Looking back I basically consider myself a biological machine responding mechanically to the inputs of my environment. There was very little of what I would now call “free will” or “rational agency” going into my decisions about what I liked or how I liked to spend my time.
